DOC.brief_title: Glucose Control During Labour Gestational Diabetes Mellitus With Insulin Treatment : A Randomized Controlled Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Intrapartum blood glucose level negative correlation neonatal blood glucose level type 1 diabetic . In gestational diabetes correlation less clear . In view current knowledge , seem moderately elevate intrapartum blood glucose may cause neonatal hypoglycemia . There consensus treat intrapartum blood glucose level gestational diabetic . Some study imply mother gestational diabetes would normal blood glucose level labour hence would need intervention daily insulin dosage less 0,5-1 IU/kg . Study participant recruit study Tampere University Hospital Maternity Ward daily insulin dose exceed 30 IU . Randomization do 37th gestational week , vaginal delivery plan , HbA1c measure . Randomization envelope open delivery ward active labour begin treatment blood glucose level carry accordingly . If insulin dose 1 IU/kg , participant treat active treament group despite result randomization . All neonate recieve milk substitute birth labour ward . Plasma glucose measure immediately neonate symptom low blood sugar . If , plasma glucose measure approximately two hour birth every 4 hour plasma glucose 3,0 mmol/l three consecutive measurement .
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman gestational diabetes mellitus daily insulin dosage 30 IU plan caesarean section , premature birth ( < 37 gestational week )
